entry.title: Access to data in bulk
entry.summary: When building a service, I want to be able to access data in bulk, so that I do not have to make multiple requests for data.

entry.title: Access to raw data
entry.summary: When building a service, I want to have access to raw data (as opposed to calculated statistical data), so that I am able to get the fullest value from the data.

entry.title: Easy access to data
entry.summary: When building a service, I want access to data without having to ask for it.

entry.title: Ensure data meets the specification
entry.summary: Before publishing a data, I want to be able to validate that data I've collect meets the specification, so that I can fix any issues.

entry.title: Maintained data
entry.summary: When using a dataset, I want to have confidence that the dataset is being maintained, so that I can trust that the data is relevent and usable.

entry.title: Provide feedback
entry.summary: When data is incorrect or missing, I want to be able to inform the data maintainer, so that they can fix the dataset.

entry.title: Unrestrictive usage
entry.summary: When building a service, I want to use data openly and without any prohibitive restrictions, so that I am able to get full value from the data.

entry.title: Up-to-date data
entry.summary: When I am building a service, I want to have confidence that I have access to the most recent data, so that the thing I am building is useful and relevant.

entry.title: What data is needed
entry.summary: When defining a data standard, I want to know what data is needed, so that the right data is made available.
